name: TILL DEATH (RAYLIATOR)
description:
PLAY IN FULL SCREEN! THANKS :)

AN HONEST COP AND A VENGEFUL THIEF HAVE JOINED FORCES TOGETHER IN ORDER TO INFILTRATE A PRISON FACILITY AND OBTAIN EVIDENCE THAT CAN PUT AWAY THE EVIL MASTERMIND FOR GOOD.

USE A AND D TO MOVE AND W TO JUMP.

PRESS SPACE TO SWITCH BETWEEN CHARACTERS.

PRESS LEFT/RIGHT ARROW KEYS TO SHOOT.
